‚ö†Ô∏è Note on Taxable Items:

Concessions, merchandise, and bingo supplies (daubers, seat cushions) sold separately are typically taxable. Consider creating a separate "Merchandise" category for these items.

üí° Package Strategy Tips:

  • Create 3-4 packages at different price points to appeal to all players
  • Mark one package as "Best Value" to guide purchasing decisions
  • Include seat selection in premium packages as an incentive
  • Consider time-based packages (Early Bird) to manage crowd flow
  • Offer loyalty point redemption on higher-tier packages

  • Free Electronic Upgrade (300 pts)
  • Buy-One-Get-One (250 pts)
üçî Food & Beverage
50-200 Points
  • Free Snack Pack (50 pts)
  • Meal Voucher (150 pts)
  • Drink Credits (75 pts)

üéÅ Merchandise
200-1000 Points
  • Branded Dauber Set (200 pts)
  • Lucky Seat Cushion (400 pts)

‚≠ê VIP Experiences
1000+ Points
  • Reserved Table Month (2000 pts)
  • Private Party Package (5000 pts)
  • Caller for a Day (3000 pts)
  • VIP Parking Pass (1500 pts)

üí° Loyalty Program Tips:

  • Set point values that encourage repeat visits (e.g., 1 point per $1 spent)
  • Create tiers of rewards from small (50 pts) to aspirational (5000+ pts)
  • Include experiential rewards that money can't buy
  • Rotate seasonal items to keep the program fresh
  • Consider partner rewards with local businesses

üéÅ Why Use a Loyalty Rewards Program?

A loyalty rewards program helps you retain customers, increase repeat visits, and build lasting relationships with your members. Turn one-time visitors into loyal regulars who feel valued and appreciated.

  • üí∞ Increase customer lifetime value
  • üîÑ Boost repeat visit frequency
  • üìà Track member spending and preferences
  • üéØ Target promotions to your best customers
  • ‚≠ê Build emotional connection and brand loyalty
  • üìä Gain valuable insights into customer behavior

Payment Processing

Accept payments online and in-person

Why Enable Payment Processing?

  • Accept Credit & Debit Cards - Process Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover
  • Online & In-Person Payments - Unified processing across all channels
  • Automatic Reconciliation - Transactions sync with your records instantly

  • Fraud Protection - Advanced fraud detection included

QuickBooks

Accounting & bookkeeping integration

Why Connect QuickBooks?

  • Automatic Sync - Transactions, invoices, and payments sync automatically
  • Accurate Books - Eliminate manual entry errors and save hours of work
  • Real-Time Reporting - See up-to-date financial data in QuickBooks
  • Tax Ready - All transactions categorized and ready for tax filing
  • Cash Flow Insights - Track revenue and expenses effortlessly

Ready to connect? Toggle the switch above to link your QuickBooks account.

Not Connected

Connect your QuickBooks account using OAuth 2.0. Your data is secured and you can disconnect at any time.

üìà

SAR - Stand Alone Reporting

Advanced session reporting for bingo halls

Why Use SAR?

  • Session Analytics - Detailed insights into each bingo session
  • Attendance Tracking - Monitor player counts and trends
  • Revenue Analysis - Track income per session and day
  • Game Performance - See which games and packages perform best
  • Staff Metrics - Evaluate staff performance by session
  • Custom Reports - Export data for regulatory compliance

Ready to enable? Toggle the switch above to activate advanced reporting.

Active

SAR is a NewCo feature - no additional configuration needed. Reports are available in the Reports section.
